| History                 = After becoming a billionaire when he inherited [[Reed Richards (Earth-616)|Reed Richard]]'s patents and licensing fee settlements, the [[Jonathan Storm (Earth-616)|Human Torch]] invested part of his fortune in the creation of Avengers Mansion Inc., a special holding company to own and operate the [[Avengers Mansion]] with diversified assets and investments set to operate in perpetuity. The new company additionally made sure to account for the payment of insurance, utilities, taxes, and the building's staff.{{r|Uncanny Avengers Vol 3 30}}
